title: Update
body: Hi, this is a humble request to update Narada to the latest version as the version you are currently using will not be supported for long. Thank you.

data.markdown_body: Hi, we're excited to announce that you can now check the live subscription for an IPO by updating the app to the latest version and tapping the **Check subscription** button on the IPO page. We've added the subscriptions only for the recent IPOs at this moment and it will also be available for all the upcoming IPOs so if you try to check the subscription for an old IPO and don't find it there, please don't mind. Thanks!
data.created_at: Hi, we're excited to announce that you can now check the live subscription for an IPO by updating the app to the latest version and tapping the **Check subscription** button on the IPO page.
